price: 35. Waxayna yidhaahdeen: Innagaa idinka maal iyo awlaad badan, mana nihin kuwa la cadaabayo17.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
footnotes: 17. Waxaa hoda gaalada waxa uu Alle ku siiyey adduunka, waxayna moodaan inuu u naxariisan Aakhirada oo cadaabeyn.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū naḥnu aktharu amwālan wa-awlādan wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
